title: These Black Friday Deals Are Too Good for ELLE Editors to Pass Up
description: Adidas Sambas, Hailey Bieber x Wardrobe.NYC, and so much more.
excerpt: We have Adidas Samba sneakers, Hailey Bieber x Wardrobe.NYC coats, and so much more on our Black Friday shopping list. See all of the editor-approved deals here.
text: Adidas Japan Suede-Trimmed Leather Sneakers“The obsession with Adidas sneakers is real. I mean, how could you deny a comfortable, versatile shoe that goes with everything? I have a pair of Japan sneakers that I’ve worn with my Eterne maxi dresses, Agolde jeans, and so much more. They’re getting dirty, so I’m excited to replace them with a fresh, extra-clean pair.”—Alexis Bennett Parker, commerce content leadBaserange Red Mea Lounge Pants“I’ve yet to let go of my most comfortable, lived-in sweatpants, but I’m hoping to slowly graduate to a more elevated pair of pants that I can wear nearly everywhere without compromising my comfort. I love the bold red color of these knit lounge pants, plus they’re made with recycled wool.”—Dale Arden Chong, senior fashion commerce editorAdvertisement - Continue Reading BelowWardrobe.NYC x Hailey Bieber Double-Breasted Wool Coat“I’ve loved Wardrobe NYC for so many years because its pieces are easy to style and can be effortlessly chic on their own. I feel like this coat is a classic staple for anyone’s wardrobe, especially when it’s on sale at this price.”—Carson Stannard, freelance fashion associateTopshop Stassi Faux Fur Shoulder Bag“I’ve always loved animal print, so I’m very excited that it’s trending this season in all its iterations. I fell in love with this zebra east-west bag the moment I saw it. And now that it’s on sale for under $50, I’m ready to make it mine.”—Meg Donohue, associate fashion commerce editorAdvertisement - Continue Reading BelowHelsa Crossover Suit Trouser“I own quite a few pieces from Helsa, and they never disappoint. I have a feeling this sophisticated chocolate trouser with its double pleats will also serve as a power piece in my wardrobe.”—Alexis Bennett Parker, commerce content leadKhaite River Metallic Leather Mules“Kitten heels are my go-to with puddle jeans, especially a pair with a pointed toe that perfectly peeks from underneath a long hemline. This gold pair feels extra special with its metallic gold finish.”—Alexis Bennett Parker, commerce content leadAdvertisement - Continue Reading BelowSkims Soft Lounge Long Slip Dress“I’ve been obsessed with this Skims dress ever since I saw it on a very chic PR girl at a summer event but I’ve always missed the restock, so now’s the perfect time to shop the sleek and sexy (but effortless!) style.”—Madison Rextroat, fashion and accessories assistantDries Van Noten Printed Pleated Mesh Midi Skirt“In my opinion, no one does prints quite like Dries van Noten, and I love the way these colors go together. Plus, you’ll find that it’s surprisingly versatile, making this deal even more worth adding to your closet.”—Dale Arden Chong, senior fashion commerce editorAdvertisement - Continue Reading BelowToga Pulla Black Eyelet Metal Sabot Loafers“I love a shoe that combines edginess and comfort and these Toga Pulla slides perfectly embody that aesthetic. They could be worn as a statement shoe or, in my case, I’d almost every day with a lovely knit sock.”—Madison Rextroat, fashion and accessories assistantRoberta Einer Natalie Halterneck Cotton-Blend Maxi Dress“I know we're gearing up for winter, but I plan on escaping the cold and spending the holidays with my family in Florida. This dress will be perfect for a day at the beach with my nieces.”—Alexis Bennett Pakrer, commerce content leadAdvertisement - Continue Reading BelowChimi Black 04 Sunglasses“I selected these because I’m obsessed with the Chimi brand itself. They offer classic styles that feel expensive, but at an affordable price point, especially at this sale price.”—Carson Stannard, freelance fashion associateLevi’s 501® Original High Waist Straight Leg Jeans“I’m on the hunt for a pair of perfect-fitting jeans. I love something that hugs my hips and offers a bit of volume around the ankles. I’ve heard nothing but great things about the Levi’s 501 jeans, and at this price point, I really can’t say no.”—Alexis Bennett Parker, commerce content leadAdvertisement - Continue Reading BelowMM6 Maison Margiela Leather Mules“I’m getting tired of the singular pair of white sneakers I wear, so desperately need a shoe that is A) comfortable, B) office-appropriate, and C) fashionable yet easy-to-style. Dare I say I think I found just that in these Margiela mules.”—Meg Donohue, associate fashion commerce editor Le Jean Cashmere Polo Sweater“My shopping strategy is to save items that I like to my wish list ahead of time. So, I have my fingers crossed that this sporty chic polo goes on sale. If not, I’ll be shopping a few other styles that are already marked down—like this affordable one from Mango and this chic option by Grlfrnd.”—Alexis Bennett Parker, commerce content leadAlexis Bennett Parker is the Commerce Content Lead at ELLE.com. In this newly created role, she oversees all shopping-related stories online, from fashion-forward trend pieces to the most coveted beauty buys on the market right now. Alexis has worked in the publishing space for 11 years, and seven of those years have been dedicated to helping shoppers make informed purchases—no buyer’s remorse here! Before joining the team at ELLE.com, she worked in the editorial departments of Vogue, Cosmopolitan, and InStyle, to name a few magazines. Not only has Alexis worked closely with several brands and tested hundreds of products over the course of her career, but she’s also won awards for her work as a shopping journalist. Namely, she was an honoree at the Pynk Magazine Gala in 2023, received the Condé Nast Commerce Content Award for Best Article by a New Hire in 2021, and was included on the Top 40 Under 40 Heir’s List in 2018.
html:
Adidas Japan Suede-Trimmed Leather Sneakers

“The obsession with Adidas sneakers is real. I mean, how could you deny a comfortable, versatile shoe that goes with everything? I have a pair of Japan sneakers that I’ve worn with my Eterne maxi dresses, Agolde jeans, and so much more. They’re getting dirty, so I’m excited to replace them with a fresh, extra-clean pair.”—Alexis Bennett Parker, commerce content lead

Baserange Red Mea Lounge Pants

“I’ve yet to let go of my most comfortable, lived-in sweatpants, but I’m hoping to slowly graduate to a more elevated pair of pants that I can wear nearly everywhere without compromising my comfort. I love the bold red color of these knit lounge pants, plus they’re made with recycled wool.”—Dale Arden Chong, senior fashion commerce editor

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Wardrobe.NYC x Hailey Bieber Double-Breasted Wool Coat

“I’ve loved Wardrobe NYC for so many years because its pieces are easy to style and can be effortlessly chic on their own. I feel like this coat is a classic staple for anyone’s wardrobe, especially when it’s on sale at this price.”—Carson Stannard, freelance fashion associate

Topshop Stassi Faux Fur Shoulder Bag

“I’ve always loved animal print, so I’m very excited that it’s trending this season in all its iterations. I fell in love with this zebra east-west bag the moment I saw it. And now that it’s on sale for under $50, I’m ready to make it mine.”—Meg Donohue, associate fashion commerce editor

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Helsa Crossover Suit Trouser

“I own quite a few pieces from Helsa, and they never disappoint. I have a feeling this sophisticated chocolate trouser with its double pleats will also serve as a power piece in my wardrobe.”—Alexis Bennett Parker, commerce content lead

Khaite River Metallic Leather Mules

“Kitten heels are my go-to with puddle jeans, especially a pair with a pointed toe that perfectly peeks from underneath a long hemline. This gold pair feels extra special with its metallic gold finish.”—Alexis Bennett Parker, commerce content lead

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Skims Soft Lounge Long Slip Dress

“I’ve been obsessed with this Skims dress ever since I saw it on a very chic PR girl at a summer event but I’ve always missed the restock, so now’s the perfect time to shop the sleek and sexy (but effortless!) style.”—Madison Rextroat, fashion and accessories assistant

Dries Van Noten Printed Pleated Mesh Midi Skirt

“In my opinion, no one does prints quite like Dries van Noten, and I love the way these colors go together. Plus, you’ll find that it’s surprisingly versatile, making this deal even more worth adding to your closet.”—Dale Arden Chong, senior fashion commerce editor

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Toga Pulla Black Eyelet Metal Sabot Loafers

“I love a shoe that combines edginess and comfort and these Toga Pulla slides perfectly embody that aesthetic. They could be worn as a statement shoe or, in my case, I’d almost every day with a lovely knit sock.”—Madison Rextroat, fashion and accessories assistant

Roberta Einer Natalie Halterneck Cotton-Blend Maxi Dress

“I know we're gearing up for winter, but I plan on escaping the cold and spending the holidays with my family in Florida. This dress will be perfect for a day at the beach with my nieces.”—Alexis Bennett Pakrer, commerce content lead

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Chimi Black 04 Sunglasses

“I selected these because I’m obsessed with the Chimi brand itself. They offer classic styles that feel expensive, but at an affordable price point, especially at this sale price.”—Carson Stannard, freelance fashion associate

Levi’s 501® Original High Waist Straight Leg Jeans

“I’m on the hunt for a pair of perfect-fitting jeans. I love something that hugs my hips and offers a bit of volume around the ankles. I’ve heard nothing but great things about the Levi’s 501 jeans, and at this price point, I really can’t say no.”—Alexis Bennett Parker, commerce content lead

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

MM6 Maison Margiela Leather Mules

“I’m getting tired of the singular pair of white sneakers I wear, so desperately need a shoe that is A) comfortable, B) office-appropriate, and C) fashionable yet easy-to-style. Dare I say I think I found just that in these Margiela mules.”—Meg Donohue, associate fashion commerce editor

Le Jean Cashmere Polo Sweater

“My shopping strategy is to save items that I like to my wish list ahead of time. So, I have my fingers crossed that this sporty chic polo goes on sale. If not, I’ll be shopping a few other styles that are already marked down—like this affordable one from Mango and this chic option by Grlfrnd.”—Alexis Bennett Parker, commerce content lead

Alexis Bennett Parker is the Commerce Content Lead at ELLE.com. In this newly created role, she oversees all shopping-related stories online, from fashion-forward trend pieces to the most coveted beauty buys on the market right now. Alexis has worked in the publishing space for 11 years, and seven of those years have been dedicated to helping shoppers make informed purchases—no buyer’s remorse here! Before joining the team at ELLE.com, she worked in the editorial departments of Vogue, Cosmopolitan, and InStyle, to name a few magazines. Not only has Alexis worked closely with several brands and tested hundreds of products over the course of her career, but she’s also won awards for her work as a shopping journalist. Namely, she was an honoree at the Pynk Magazine Gala in 2023, received the Condé Nast Commerce Content Award for Best Article by a New Hire in 2021, and was included on the Top 40 Under 40 Heir’s List in 2018.
